cause.description:
Greyhound racing has been going on for a long time, and as a tradition, after a greyhound can no longer race it is killed. TYhis cause is to stop the killing of innocent dogs worldwide.
1. Dogs have feelings.
2. Greyhound racing is cruel.
3. Gambeling money on animals is wrong
cause.mission: Stop The Killing of Greyhounds that are to old to race.
cause.name: Don't Kill Greyhounds That HAve Stopped Racing Cause
